fields.name: txtTaxpayerName
fields.title: Name(s) shown on your return - This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtSSN
fields.title: Your social security number  - This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtChangeAddr
fields.title: Enter the address of your main home to which the qualified mortgage certificate relates if it is different from the address shown on your tax return

fields.name: txtChangeCity
fields.title: City

fields.name: cboChangeState
fields.title: State

fields.name: txtChangeZip
fields.title: Zip Code

fields.name: txtMortCrdIssuerName
fields.title: Name of Issuer of Mortgage Credit Certificate

fields.name: txtMortCrdCertNum
fields.title: Mortgage Credit Certificate Number

fields.name: txtMortCrdIssueDate
fields.title: Issue date

fields.name: txtIntPaidOnIndebet
fields.title: Line 1. Interest paid on the certified indebtedness amount. If someone else (other than your spouse if filing  jointly) also held an interest in the home, enter only your share of the interest paid

fields.name: txtCertiCdtRate
fields.title: Line 2. Enter the certificate credit rate shown on your Mortgage Credit Certificate. Do not enter the interest  rate on your home mortgage

fields.name: txtMulLn1ByLn2
fields.title: Line 3. If line 2 is 20% or less, multiply line 1 by line 2. If line 2 is more than 20%, or you refinanced your  mortgage and received a reissued certificate, see the instructions for the amount to enter. You must reduce your deduction for home mortgage interest on Schedule A (Form 1040) by the  amount on line 3

fields.name: txtAmtLn18Fr008396
fields.title: Line 4. Enter any 2018 credit carryforward from line 16 of your 2020 Form 8396

fields.name: txtAmtLn16Fr018396
fields.title: Line 5. Enter any 2019 credit carryforward from line 14 of your 2020 Form 8396

fields.name: txtAmtLn19Fr028396
fields.title: Line 6. Enter any 2020 credit carryforward from line 17 of your 2020 Form 8396

fields.name: txtAddLn03To06
fields.title: Line 7. Add lines 3 through 6 - This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtSubLn9FrLn8
fields.title: Line 8. Limitation based on tax liability. Enter the amount from line 3 of the Credit Limit Worksheet in the instructions

fields.name: txtCurYrMortIntCdt
fields.title: Line 9. Current year mortgage interest credit. Enter the smaller of line 7 or line 8. Also include this amount on Schedule 3 (Form 1040), line 6g

fields.name: txtAddLn3AndLn4
fields.title: Line 10. Add lines 3 and 4. This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtAmtFromLine7
fields.title: Line 11. Enter the amount from line 7. This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtMaxOfLn11Ln12
fields.title: Line 12. Enter the larger of line 9 or line 10. This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtSubFrLn14FrLn13
fields.title: Line 13. Subtract line 12 from line 11 - This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtCdt02Carryfwd04
fields.title: Line 14. 2020 credit carryforward to 2022. Enter the smaller of line 6 or line 13  - This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtSubLn16FrLn15
fields.title: Line 15. Subtract line 14 from line 13  - This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtCdt01Carryfwd04
fields.title: Line 16. 2019 credit carryforward to 2022. Enter the smaller of line 5 or line 15 - This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtCdt03Carryfwd04
fields.title: Line 17. 2021 credit carryforward to 2022. Subtract line 9 from line 3. If zero or less, enter -0- This field is automatically calculated for you
